DOC.HEADLINE: POLICE SEEK BROTHER OF ITALY PREMIER
DOC.TEXT: Italian police were seeking the brother of Prime_Minister Silvio Berlusconi on Wednesday after magistrates ordered his arrest for suspected corruption in the latest blow to the battered right-wing government . The arrest_warrant was issued as prosecutors examined allegations that tax examiners were bribed in exchange for approval of doctored books at Berlusconi ' s firm Fininvest . The whereabouts of Paolo Berlusconi , who heads the family ' s property businesses , were unknown , but judicial sources speculated he might surrender today . Paolo Berlusconi already faces trial in two other corruption cases .
